name: Erythrocytic Microangiopathic Hemolysis with Thrombocytopenia (EMHT-9666)
chief_complaint: I've been feeling extremely tired, have bruises everywhere, and my urine looks like cola.
prognosis: Guarded - 40% mortality without treatment. With aggressive therapy, 70% survival at 1 year but high relapse risk.
description: A novel variant of thrombotic microangiopathy characterized by acquired ADAMTS13 deficiency with unique erythrocyte fragmentation patterns. Pathogenesis involves autoantibodies against both ADAMTS13 and glycophorin C, causing simultaneous platelet consumption and hemolysis. Distinct from classic TTP by presence of hepatosplenic sequestration.
